content: gateau danielle couriér add a touch of elegance to any outfit with our gauge stunning gateau cowl delicately knit with variegated 16 stitches = 4 in stockinette stitch yarn it s the perfect warm-weather accessory with take time to save time swatch and check your row of stockinette garter and occasional lace it s gauge before casting on perfect for confident beginners for the full version check our website stand out this season with the abbreviations beautiful gateau cowl k knit k2tog knit 2 together materials p purl #4 worsted about 108 yards noro silk garden yo yarnover 45% silk 45% moahir 10% wool merino 108 yards shown in color #500 finished measurements small 6 tall x 22 circumference tools & notions us 8 - 24 needles stitch markers note finished measurements are given after blocking the pattern with us 8 needles cast on 90 stitches using the long tail cast on join in the round being careful not to twist placing beginning of round marker beginning border pattern rounds 1&3 purl around rounds 2&4 knit around round 5 purl around body pattern chart ∙ ∙ 10 body pattern 9 knit round 1 knit around 8 round 2 knit around 7 / k2tog round 3 knit around ∙ ∙ 6 round 4 purl around / o 5 ∙ purl round 5 *yo k2tog repeat from * to end of round ∙ ∙ 4 round 6 purl around 3 o yarnover round 7 knit around 2 round 8 knit around 1 round 9 knit around round 10 purl around repeat rounds 1-10 of body pattern until cowl measures 5 from cast on ending with round 10 final border pattern rounds 1/3 knit around rounds 2/4 purl around finishing bind off loosely knitwise
